description: Boil water and salt it. Mix ground turkey with seasonings and form into meatballs. Bake meatballs. Cook spaghetti. Combine meatballs with tomato sauce and serve over pasta with parmesan cheese.
steps: Boil a medium large pot of water and salt it with two tablespoons of salt and a splash of olive oil.

Take a pound of ground turkey and add two tablespoons of Worcestershire, ground onion, ground garlic, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper. Also add panko breadcrumbs about a quarter cup and an entire egg. Mix the meat with the seasonings.
Form the meat mixture into balls that are 1 inch in diameter.
Place the meatballs on a cookie sheet and bake them at 350 degrees in an oven for about 20 minutes.
While the meatballs are baking, add two cups of spaghetti to the boiling water and cook according to package instructions.
Once the meatballs are cooked, place them in a pot with jarred tomato sauce.
Finally, place the meatballs and sauce over the cooked spaghetti and add parmesan cheese.
